DataElement.preferredName: Circulating Tumor Cell Specimen Preservation Agent Lot Expiration Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date a lot or batch of a circulating tumor cell preservation agent, a chemical preservative to prevent the decay or degradation of metastatic cancer cells found in a specimen of peripheral blood expires or reaches the end of the useable period.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Circulating Tumor Cell Specimen Preservation Agent Lot Expiration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the expiration or end of the useable period of a lot or batch of a circulating tumor cell preservation agent, a chemical preservative to prevent the decay or degradation of metastatic cancer cells found in a specimen of peripheral blood.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Circulating Tumor Cell Specimen Preservation Agent
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A metastatic cancer cell found in the peripheral blood.:Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.:The activity of protecting something from loss or danger; a process that saves organic substances from decay; to maintain or keep intact.:An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: A metastatic cancer cell found in the peripheral blood.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
The activity of protecting something from loss or danger; a process that saves organic substances from decay; to maintain or keep intact.
An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.

Property.preferredDefinition: Any collection in its entirety; miscellaneous articles considered as one unit for purchase.:To come to a close or end of useable period; termination.

Concepts.definition: A defined quantity of manufactured material or product produced in a single manufacturing process or series of process steps so that it reasonably is expected to be homogeneous.
To come to a close or end of useable period; termination.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
